UPDATE VEHICLE_IMPORTANT_INDICATOR SET TRAIN_COUNT=(SELECT CASE WHEN t0.PLAN_SUM>0 THEN (ROUND(t0.REAL_SUM/t0.PLAN_SUM,2))*100 ELSE 0 END FROM(SELECT SUM(REAL_DEPARTURE+REAL_RECEIVE) AS REAL_SUM,SUM(PLAN_DEPARTURE+PLAN_RECEIVE) AS PLAN_SUM FROM VEHICLE_DRIVING_DEPOT WHERE DEL_FLAG = '0' AND DATA_TYPE = '1' AND START_DATE >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE) t0), CONSTRUCT_COUNT=(SELECT CASE WHEN t1.B_PLAN_SUM>0 THEN (ROUND(t1.B_COMPLETE_SUM/t1.B_PLAN_SUM,2))*100 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT SUM(B_COMPLETE) AS B_COMPLETE_SUM,SUM(B_PLAN) AS B_PLAN_SUM FROM VEHICLE_CONSTRUCT_RECORD WHERE DEL_FLAG = '0' AND DATA_TYPE = '1' AND START_DATE >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE) t1), UPDATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE DEL_FLAG = '0' AND DATA_TYPE = '1' AND START_DATE = to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND END_DATE = to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
